long_description: The Nau Atelier Jacket hides its performance features, such as water and wind resistance, behind classic style that will keep you looking good on your city explorations. Blend of recycled polyester and organic cotton is bonded to a recycled polyester knit to make a comfortable soft-shell fabric that resists wind and water. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Collar flips up to protect your neck from harsh winds and searing solar rays. Includes 2 hand pockets with dual access points and 1 zippered chest pocket. Nau Atelier Jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: The Nau Atelier Jacket hides its performance features, such as water and wind resistance, behind classic style that will keep you looking good on your city explorations.
